content: nothing says playful like a pom pom and the big hat with its oversized pom and reverse stockinette peeking out from the brim manages to be both playful and practical made with super bulky yarn the big hat produces a warm cushy fabric that knits up quick how quick test knitters made one in the time it took to watch titanic yep the 1997 blockbuster hit we re a nostalgic bunch it s also a great pattern for ambitious beginners looking to expand their skills beyond the basics the big hat includes two tutorial videos that guide you step-by-step through the pattern from beginning to end w atch the entire big hat being knit up and follow along at your own pace a note about sizing the big hat will fit comfortably on an average-sized head that would be about 21 in circumference get the free pattern here https //sheepandstitch com/pattern/how-to-knit-a-chunky-hat-for-beginners/
